CustomField.description: If Liquidation Date is between 1st and 15th of the Month, Billing Start is 1st of that month If Liquidation Date is between 16th and end of month, Billing Start is 1st of the following month
CustomField.formula:
IF(
(DAY( Liquidation_Date__c )<16),
(DATE(YEAR( Liquidation_Date__c ),MONTH( Liquidation_Date__c ),1)),
(DATE(YEAR( Liquidation_Date__c ),MONTH( Liquidation_Date__c )+1,1)) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Liquidation Date is between 1st and 15th of the Month, Billing Start is 1st of that month If Liquidation Date is between 16th and end of month, Billing Start is 1st of the following month
CustomField.label: Conv Billing Subscription Start Date
